return_on_equity.description: Measures how efficiently a company uses shareholders' equity to generate profits

return_on_assets.description: Measures how efficiently a company uses its assets to generate profits

return_on_invested_capital.description: Measures how efficiently a company uses its invested capital to generate profits

gross_profit_margin.description: Measures the percentage of revenue that exceeds the cost of goods sold

operating_margin.description: Measures the percentage of revenue that remains after operating expenses

net_margin.description: Measures the percentage of revenue that remains as net income

ebitda_margin.description: Measures the percentage of revenue that remains as EBITDA

free_cash_flow_margin.description: Measures the percentage of revenue converted to free cash flow

current_ratio.description: Measures a company's ability to pay short-term obligations

quick_ratio.description: Measures a company's ability to pay short-term obligations without selling inventory

cash_ratio.formula: Cash and Cash Equivalents / Current Liabilities
cash_ratio.description: Measures a company's ability to pay short-term obligations with cash only

operating_cash_flow_ratio.description: Measures a company's ability to pay short-term obligations with operating cash flow

debt_to_equity.description: Measures the relative proportion of debt and equity financing

debt_to_assets.description: Measures the percentage of assets financed by debt

interest_coverage.description: Measures a company's ability to pay interest on outstanding debt

debt_service_coverage.description: Measures a company's ability to service its debt obligations

equity_multiplier.description: Measures the amount of a firm's assets that are financed by shareholders' equity

asset_turnover.description: Measures how efficiently a company uses its assets to generate revenue

inventory_turnover.formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory
inventory_turnover.description: Measures how many times a company's inventory is sold and replaced over a period

receivables_turnover.description: Measures how efficiently a company collects on its receivables

payables_turnover.formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Accounts Payable
payables_turnover.description: Measures how quickly a company pays its suppliers

price_to_earnings.formula: Market Price per Share / Earnings per Share
price_to_earnings.description: Measures the price investors are willing to pay for each dollar of earnings

price_to_sales.description: Measures the price investors are willing to pay for each dollar of sales

price_to_book.formula: Market Price per Share / Book Value per Share
price_to_book.description: Measures the price investors are willing to pay for each dollar of book value

ev_ebitda.description: Measures the value of a company relative to its EBITDA (preferred by analysts over P/E)

ev_sales.description: Measures the value of a company relative to its revenue

ev_fcf.description: Measures the value of a company relative to its free cash flow

free_cash_flow.description: The cash a company generates after accounting for capital expenditures (Warren Buffett's favorite metric)

free_cash_flow_per_share.description: Free cash flow per share - shows cash generation per share

free_cash_flow_yield.description: The percentage of market cap that is free cash flow (like a dividend yield)

cash_flow_return_on_investment.description: Measures cash flow return on invested capital

revenue_growth_rate.description: Measures the rate of revenue growth over time

earnings_growth_rate.description: Measures the rate of earnings growth over time

free_cash_flow_growth_rate.description: Measures the rate of free cash flow growth over time

book_value_growth_rate.formula: (Current Book Value - Previous Book Value) / Previous Book Value
book_value_growth_rate.description: Measures the rate of book value growth over time
